section.heading: Compliance with other laws.
section.text: Health maintenance organizations shall comply with the following laws:

para.text: Subchapter I of Chapter 7 of this title;
The Reasonable Health Insurance Ratemaking Reform Act of 2010 [Chapters 30A, 31C, and 33A of this title].

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 27, 2003, D.C. Law 14-252, § 2(d), 50 DCR 225
D.C. Law 18-360 deleted “and” from the end of par. (4), substituted “; and” for a period the end of par. (5), and added par. (6).

Application of Law 14-252: Section 3 of D.C. Law 14-252 provided: “This act shall not apply until the Commissioner gives written notice that all necessary rules and administrative procedures are in place to effect the provisions of this act.”
